courseDescription:
Performing first aid on an individual is a wonderful experience that may benefit you and others and can make a significant impact on a person's health and wellbeing during an accident or emergency. The objectives of this course are to introduce you to martial arts first aid, guide you through the most common injuries and scenarios that may occur during a martial arts event and teach you how to respond to an emergency and save lives.

We will start with a brief introduction to general first aid, the five basic first aid objectives and then explore the commonly used martial arts in the UK. You will also learn about the initial examinations and assessments that a martial arts first aider must conduct at the scene of an incident. Furthermore, you will study the critical procedures martial art first aider may perform when confronted with a casualty with a life-threatening condition. You will also examine some minor and major injuries you may encounter during an event.

Moreover, we will show you how to recognise the early signs of life-threatening medical issues that can occur during sporting activities. Lastly, you will learn about the precautions that an individual or a first aider should take to avoid injuries while participating in martial arts training and competitions. The publisher of this course is John Academy. They offer courses that are appropriate for all people at all stages of their professions, allowing them to learn at their own pace. Start this course now and gain excellent martial art first aid skills.
